highlights: 63-acre modern campus in Greater Noida with 14 specialized schools
NIRF 2025 Rank: 87th in Universities Category, 101-150 Overall
Times Higher Education 2026: Top 601-800 Globally, 59th in India
Ranked 1st Private University in India with highest international students (2000+ from 85+ countries)
5th Overall in India by Association of Indian Universities
QS I-Gauge Platinum Rating for Journalism & Media Studies
Times B School Management Ranking 2025: 4th among top 40 Universities in India
Research Excellence Ranking 2024: Diamond Band in India
ESER 2024: Diamond Band for Employability and Startup Ecosystem
State-of-the-art infrastructure with e-learning integrated classrooms
UGC approved, part of Sharda Group of Institutions (established 1996)
